summary: This bill, the Securing Innovation in Financial Regulation Act, aims to codify and support innovation in the financial technology (FinTech) sector. It mandates the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to establish the Strategic Hub for Innovation and Financial Technology (FinHub) to engage with market participants and provide resources on emerging technologies. It also codifies LabCFTC within the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC), outlining its purpose to promote FinTech innovation, provide information to the Commission, and offer outreach. Both FinHub and LabCFTC are required to submit annual reports.
